review: I love my Chromecast, especially when I use my phone as a remote. I have a Chromebook and (ironically) the Chromecast seems to have trouble switching episodes seamlessly when casting from my chromebook. My iPhone, however, works much better - the episodes play back to back and I can still send texts and browse the internet on my phone.
